0000101000011011 0110111111000001 1 -> sum: 0111100111011101, cout: 0
1010000000111101 0000010010000101 0 -> sum: 1010010011000010, cout: 0
0101001011101100 1000111110010001 0 -> sum: 1110001001111101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
